segments.advisor_message: Thanks for sharing about your family. So, just to recap, you mentioned you have a daughter named Sarah, right?
segments.client_message: Yes, that's correct. Her full name is Sarah Johnson.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, Sarah Johnson. And when is her birthday? You mentioned it earlier.
segments.client_message: Oh, it's on the 12th of March, 2015. So, 12-03-2015.

segments.advisor_message: Great, I'll note that down. Lastly, you mentioned that she would be considered a dependent until she turns 18, which would be in 2033?
segments.client_message: Exactly, yeah. So, until the date 12-03-2033.
